fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Suck the life force out of a player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may speak in their channelc and they have to listen to all commands you give them in that channel (that pertains to the game)
- If you switch players, the previous player learns your name and role
- If you switch players again, everyone learns your name and role and all vote immunity on you will always fail
